org.apache.juneau.rest.util

Class CachingHttpServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • org.apache.juneau.rest.util.CachingHttpServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    public class CachingHttpServletResponse
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
    Wraps an HttpServletResponse and caches the output stream in a separate buffer for debugging purposes.
    • Source
